  • Method Details

    • getOrders

      @Transactional(readOnly=true) public org.springframework.data.domain.Page<OrderReadDTO> getOrders(Integer userID, Double minTotalAmount, Double maxTotalAmount, Status status, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Retrieves a page of orders filtered by the specified parameters
      Parameters:
      userID - the ID of the user who placed the orders (optional)
      minTotalAmount - the minimum total amount of the orders to search for (optional)
      maxTotalAmount - the maximum total amount of the orders to search for (optional)
      status - the status of the orders to search for (optional)
      pageable - the pagination information (optional)
      Returns:
      a page of orders

    • addOrderByUserID

      @Transactional public Optional<OrderReadDTO> addOrderByUserID(Integer userID)
      Places a new order for the user with the specified ID
      Parameters:
      userID - the ID of the user placing the order
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the created OrderReadDTO
